Title: TextBox with counter .NET WebControl (C#)
Description:
This is a TextBox with counter WebControl written in C#. It can be used and deployed in the same way as any normal control.

You can set the limit (maxlength) for the TextBox and specify the TextBoxMode (i.e. SingleLine, MultiLine, Password).

This is a TextBox with counter WebControl written in C#. It can be used and deployed in the same way as any normal control.

You can set the limit (maxlength) for the TextBox and specify the TextBoxMode (i.e. SingleLine, MultiLine, Password).
